dict.acceptation: 较小的，少数的，小…；未成年的；[乐]小调的，小音阶的；（两同姓男孩中）年幼的；
未成年人；副修科目；小公司；[逻辑学]小前提；

sent.orig: These included two reports of minor burns and reports of minor property damage.
sent.trans: 这些包括两份轻微烧伤的报告和微小的财产损失。

sent.orig: Of course, we shall inevitably make minor and even not-so-minor mistakes.
sent.trans: 当然小错误、中错误总是难免的。

sent.orig: Separating minor from major and changing minor are to further deepen the reform of state-owned enterprises.
sent.trans: “主辅分离，辅业改制”是进一步深化国有企业改革的重大举措。

sent.orig: Scope: Car maintenance are minor repairs are minor repairs.
sent.trans: 经营范围：汽车维护现小修。

sent.orig: There are major and minor principles in everything, and the minor principles are all subordinate to the major.
sent.trans: 事情有大道理，有小道理，一切小道理都归大道理管着。
